markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Monitor](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Vanth Warrior](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2427) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 18 **Perception** +25; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) 60 feet **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28, [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +25, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +25, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +23, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28 **Str** +8 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** +4 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +4 **Items** [Scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39) --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +25 **Ref** +22 **Will** +28 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) **HP** 255 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) **Resistances** [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) 10, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 10 **Frightful Presence** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 20 feet, DC 34.
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** _scythe_ +29 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 3d12+14 slashing plus spirit touch **Melee** jaws +29 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 3d8+14 slashing plus spirit touch **Divine Innate Spells** DC 34, attack +26 - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only) - **3rd** [Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173) (×3), [Searing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=269) (×3) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **5th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) **Infuse Weapon** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) A vanth's scythe is their symbol of office and gains a measure of their personal power. This scythe becomes a _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) scythe_ and is treated as if it were [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) while the vanth wields it. A vanth whose scythe is taken or destroyed can infuse a new one with an hour of work. **Reaping Scythe** The vanth throws their scythe, which flies in a 60-foot line, dealing 6d8 slashing damage to all creatures in the area (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save) and returns to the vanth's hand. **Spirit Touch** A vanth's Strikes affect [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures with the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune and deal 3d6 negative damage to living creatures and 3d6 positive damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). **Vanth's Curse** ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Misfortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=110)) **Frequency** three times per day; **Effect** The vanth bestows a curse on a creature by touching it with their scythe. The creature must attempt a DC 34 Will save.
**Critical Success** The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Vanth's Curse for 24 hours.
**Success** The target feels a momentary shudder of doom and is [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 minute by the distracting sensation.
**Failure** The target becomes morose and glum as it accepts its own inevitable fate. For 1 hour, the target is stupefied 3. Each time the target gains the dying condition, the stupefied value increases by 1, to a maximum value of stupefied 6.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the effect is permanent.
name: Vanth Warrior

Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet Melee Single Action scythe +29 (deadly d10, Magical, Trip), Damage 3d12+14 slashing plus spirit touch Melee Single Action jaws +29 (Agile), Damage 3d8+14 slashing plus spirit touch Divine Innate Spells DC 34, attack +26 - 2nd Invisibility (at will; self only) - 3rd Locate (×3), Searing Light (×3) - 4th Dimension Door (at will) - 5th Dimension Door Infuse Weapon (Divine, Evocation) A vanth's scythe is their symbol of office and gains a measure of their personal power. This scythe becomes a +2 striking scythe and is treated as if it were adamantine while the vanth wields it. A vanth whose scythe is taken or destroyed can infuse a new one with an hour of work. Reaping Scythe Two Actions The vanth throws their scythe, which flies in a 60-foot line, dealing 6d8 slashing damage to all creatures in the area (DC 34 basic Reflex save) and returns to the vanth's hand. Spirit Touch A vanth's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a ghost touch property rune and deal 3d6 negative damage to living creatures and 3d6 positive damage to undead. Vanth's Curse Two Actions (Curse, Divine, Enchantment, Misfortune) Frequency three times per day; Effect The vanth bestows a curse on a creature by touching it with their scythe. The creature must attempt a DC 34 Will save. Critical Success The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Vanth's Curse for 24 hours. Success The target feels a momentary shudder of doom and is stupefied 2 for 1 minute by the distracting sensation. Failure The target becomes morose and glum as it accepts its own inevitable fate. For 1 hour, the target is stupefied 3. Each time the target gains the dying condition, the stupefied value increases by 1, to a maximum value of stupefied 6. Critical Failure As failure, but the effect is permanent.
